actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the indexing of certain assets for purposes of determining gain or loss.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require a cost-of-living adjustment, based on the Consumer Price Index, to the adjusted basis of a capital asset at the time of its sale or exchange for purposes of determining gain or loss on such asset.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the indexing of certain assets for purposes of determining gain or loss.
